articles.content: Private banks aim to hire at least 50,000 people for entry-level roles over the coming year to battle high attrition in this segment, bankers and recruitment experts said. The lenders are facing what… [+3355 chars]

articles.author: Hemant Sood
articles.title: How do SIPs help in achieving investment goals without timing the market? MintGenie explains | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The beauty of SIPs lies in their ability to allow investors to not time the market. They offer benefits such as rupee cost averaging, compounding, and hassle-free investing. Starting early, mapping SIPs to financial goals, and never skipping an SIP are key st…
articles.content: Moreover, investors also believe that the same strategy applies to systematic investment plans (SIPs). Therefore, the elusive goal here remains to consistently predict the top or bottom of the market… [+4217 chars]
